name: Keep Going Right
description:
Title says it all. Have fun in this 2-D stick figure, not-your-typical side-scroller with many random things happening in each room you enter.  This game is a fun ripoff of "I Don't Even Game" and was made mainly for comedic purposes, so please don't read too much into it.

*This is the first game I have ever published, considering I made this while still in high school. If you enjoy playing and want to see a sequel, please let me know in the Discussion Board. I am open for any room ideas that you would like to see in the sequel if you have any!*
